name: Asteriods 3D
description:
Move around and shoot all the asteroids to win. Avoid getting hit by the asteroids and orange enemies. Cubical map also wraps around everything except bullets.

Default keybindings (can be changed in-game):

  • Look direction = WASD
  • Movement = Arrow Keys
  • Roll = QE
  • Aim = Left Shift
  • Shoot = Spacebar
  • Switch Weapon = C
  • Toggle 3rd/1st person = V
  • Pause Game = P

Types of Weapons:

  • Standard: Single shot, can spam as fast as you want. Regular sized laser.
  • Machine Gun: Hold down the shoot button to shoot continuously. Shoots smaller lasers faster.
  • Big Laser: Hold down the shoot button to fire off a friggin huge monster laser.

Developer commentary:

idk I like where this went in terms of controls (maybe having mouse controls would be better too?) and overall feel, but I suck at making challenging things beyond that. AI took forever even tho it's so bad. Might come back to this, probably not.
